mapper.select: SELECT bm.moments_id, bm.user_id, su.nickname, su.avatar, bm.moments_content, bm.is_public, bm.create_time FROM blog_moments AS bm LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.id = bm.user_id WHERE bm.is_public = '1' ORDER BY bm.create_time DESC

SELECT bm.moments_id, bm.user_id, su.nickname, su.avatar, bm.moments_content, bm.is_public, bm.create_time FROM blog_moments AS bm LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.id = bm.user_id WHERE true
AND su.nickname like concat('%',#{nickname},'%')
ORDER BY bm.create_time DESC
